website_summaries.verdict: Large, high-quality moving and packing blankets with thick cotton interior and polyester binding help protect and cushion your belongings during a move.
cons: Some folks report a chemical smell
Can shed threads, especially after washing

customer_reviews.title: Much thinner than described with chemical smell
customer_reviews.text: I don't know where all these positive reviews are coming from as I bought them and they are horrible. They stink to high heaven like chemicals and mildew, are MUCH thinner than what you can buy at Harbor Freight for a few bucks more when on sale. (Note: Harbor Freight's Haul Master Blankets also stink to high heaven but these were far worse). I ended up returning these as they were not at all as thick and stunk a lot worse. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer1

customer_reviews.title: Great set of blankets!
customer_reviews.text: These moving blankets are thick and good quality. First time I used them, I knew I had made the right choice, and would definitely buy another set if I needed more. One thing I'd caution is if you get a blanket stuck underneath a heavy item, don't try to free it up by pulling on the blanket with all your force. Lift the item to release some of the weight off the blanket. Otherwise, the blanket will tear. In otherwise normal use, I had no problems with them.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Mathews

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice large clean moving blankets moving pads, much better price than the national truck rent-myself company or the big-box hardware stores. They arrived in 2 days as promised (amazon prime), and worked very well protecting the furniture in the rent-myself-truck. I also used one as a blanket for sleeping, and it worked quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Kryton Fan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our needs!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 sets of these blankets for our movers to use to wrap/protect furniture being moved to storage...they are perfect for this purpose! If you are moving long distance, I'd go with a slightly heavier/thicker blanket but for our purposes and the short move, we only needed the, for the movers to use to protect the tops/sides before using plastic wrap. The movers wanted 12.00 for almost same type of blanket for this purpose...so this was a much better deal! Quick shipping too!
customer_reviews.author: K&F

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Good Quality, weight and thickness for protecting our furniture during our move. Good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: S Carey

customer_reviews.title: Wrapped So That They Are Very Difficult to Unwrap
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t buy these. First, they are made in China, where they eat dogs and cats and are responsible for murdering elephants and rhinos for tusks and horns that they believe are medicinal. I try not to buy things made in China. Second and significant to others, they come so tightly wrapped in plastic and binding tape within a box, that it took me 30 minutes to unwrap them. The tape was so tight, I couldn’t get a straight edge into it to cut. They are a little flimsy and must tear easily. One came out of the wrapping with a small tear. They are probably functional, but I would never order again—too much trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne A. Whyte

customer_reviews.title: If you're using these for a move they'll work great but if you're planning on using them professionally I ...
customer_reviews.text: These are cheap pads that you can tear with your hands. They're not "PRO" by any stretch of the imagination. I'm a professional mover and I own a small business. I purchased these to use for that purpose. If they were cheaper I would rate them higher but for the price I paid, I thought they would be much more durable. If you're using these for a move they'll work great but if you're planning on using them professionally I recommend looking elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Sundeen

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: While they are advertised as Deluxe Pro that is clearly an exaggeration. However, after reading the description and based on the price, I wasn't expecting a heavy duty blanket. Although they had somewhat of an odor we aired them outside for a day and they had just a slight smell. They are in the garage waiting to be used but giving off no discernible odor
customer_reviews.author: B. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Be careful washing for reuse
customer_reviews.text: These blankets worked fine for moving. If you're thinking of washing these to store them for later use in another move or storing furniture, be careful to wash them separately, as they bleed a lot of dye, and leave a pool of dark blue water in your washer. You'll need to do an empty rinse cycle after, so you don't accidentally get blue tints on your light clothes, if you do a light/white load right after.
customer_reviews.author: JLG

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time and well packaged. Weighed a lot ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and well packaged. Weighed a lot, but that was to be expected. Others had commented on the smell, and yes it was and still is horrendous, but the smell hasn’t stuck to the furniture YET and the furniture has been in storage for 2 months now. Not as durable as what was expected. 3 ripped on us as we moved, but nothing was really affected by it. We used furniture straps and when we slid the table off the straps the blanket ripped Through 3 blankets. After that we saramwraped all the other furniture pieces and had no more incidents.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good light weight blankets
customer_reviews.text: These are standard thin moving blankets. We got different weight pairs, and these were the lightest of the sets we got. They are the standard cheap blankets (that are twice as expensive) you can get at your standard discount home store. If you want thicker blankets, then look for weights of around 6.5 or higher per blanket. The price will also go up, but these are very thin. They are sturdy and the stitching was great. There was not much smell with these either. I would get them again, but only in conjunction with padding blankets if moving expensive furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Steven G.Top Contributor: Lego

customer_reviews.title: Pressed paper and felted scrap. Like very light weight pellon - only weaker.
customer_reviews.text: Thin, low quality. More of a paper product. Not woven, not thick. Any rubbing wore holes in these blankets. Thought they would be better than the UHaul blankets but they were much flimsier. Better off to spend more and protect your furnishings. Epic fail.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen in Kansas

customer_reviews.title: Not a professional moving blanket
customer_reviews.text: Seller markets the item as a "Professional Moving Blanket". The blankets are lightweight, very thin and certainly not used by professional movers - which I was during my college years. The blankets may protect an item from scratches but that is it. There would be no protection from bumps, rubs, etc during a move. If you are looking for a "professional" moving blanket - you need to continue your search because this blanket is a lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Allan W. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Good for Move, Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: Used these for our move as our items were being placed in a storage pod and shipped across an ocean. Excellent value. They are moderately thin (not thick, but not paper thin either), and are sized nice and large. The value for the number of moving blankets really can't be beat when we comparison shopped.
customer_reviews.author: A.F.

customer_reviews.title: Good blankets at a good price. Good enough for a cross-country move!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I found these online for a reasonable price! I used these for a cross-country move and they were great. They aren't the thickest moving blanket, they did the job well. The movers were able to wrap up all of my furniture entirely before we placed them in shipping containers. All of my furniture was stacked in and on each other and surrounded by boxes. Everything arrived without damage. Not sure what I will use these for now, but I definitely would re-purchase for future moves and will recommend to friends!
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Cole

customer_reviews.title: Great pads
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered pads from other vendors, but these are very, very good. While not professional grade, they are excellent for a pods move or other household uses like protecting furniture, refinishing projects etc. I have over 40 years experience in the moving business and I rate these as an excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: Captain T

customer_reviews.title: These are extremely well made, heavy duty moving blankets
customer_reviews.text: These blankets are fantastic. On a recent 300 mile move; I rented a truck and the blankets they supplied were paper thin. At the last minute; I ordered these, and am extremely glad that I did. I hastily wrapped all of my breakable items, such as artwork. I also placed the blankets on the floor of the truck. Despite my lousy job of packing, not a single item broke. I even placed wine glasses inside of these blankets, and as with everything else, no breakage. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Expressed Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for storing items
customer_reviews.text: These probably wouldn't stand up to repeated washings or continual use, but all we needed them for was wrapping items for long-term storage. I liked the weight (neither too thin nor too thick) for easy folding around large items.
customer_reviews.author: azdaddie

customer_reviews.title: Durable material and furniture was scratch free during move
customer_reviews.text: These were used during my move in the summer. The blankets kept my furniture from scratching during the move. The material was thick and padded, and held up well. I will continue to use these during any future moves.
customer_reviews.author: S.K.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, great price
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased. Shipped fast. These are not as thick as the blankets I used in the furniture business years ago, but they are just as well made. They are lighter and easier to use. A dozen store in a smaller space. I feel they are quite adequate for most applications, and if something needs extra protection you can use two. I actually bought them to wrap around a big rudder, boom, and other parts I put inside my sailboat when on the road so they don't bash around and scratch things up. I know I will have many other uses for them. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Treewallski

customer_reviews.title: Professional Moving Blankets
customer_reviews.text: This was just what I was thinking it would be. Real professional moving blankets that are heavy like you would expect them to be. I will have new clean blankets of my own to move with instead of the rented ones on the furniture. I have always like everything I have bought with the AmazonChoice label on it and this was no different! I'm very happy with this product! :)
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Used these as tarps to paint, they shed ALOT ...
customer_reviews.text: Used these as tarps to paint, they shed ALOT! Even after being washed multiple times. Filled machine up with blue fibers, Oh well lesson learned. Blue fibers all in the white paint on the table. And blue fibers filling washer rim. Plastic tarps next time.
customer_reviews.author: oliversees

customer_reviews.title: Thin but strong
customer_reviews.text: Thinner than I wanted and heavy to store but they did the job well. I used them with large rubber bands but also taped some and the blankets were not damaged when I removed the tape. They were easy to handle and the size is good. Overall, a satisfactory outcome.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian SB

customer_reviews.title: Best for moving or sound reinforcement!
customer_reviews.text: It was way cheaper to purchase these blankets rather than rent them for our last move (especially knowing we will have another move in about a year). They arrive packaged in a tight bundle that was frankly too heavy for me to lift on my own. We have kept them to hang for sound reinforcement in our basement during band practices. Good quality and great price. Totally recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Green

customer_reviews.title: These are good.
customer_reviews.text: Was a bit skeptical about buying because of the reviews about how paper thin they were and "the smell". But the price was right so I gave them a shot. I am very happy that I did. No complaints. Would buy again and recommend them to others.
customer_reviews.author: William Lenz

customer_reviews.title: Good value - thick and no color transfer or smell
customer_reviews.text: Good value, these moving blankets are thick and don't smell or shed threads or color. Moved my 2 BR apartment with these a some bubble wrap. Will save them for a future move. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: J Hath

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, affordable
customer_reviews.text: These blankets are very affordable compared to renting/buying from the moving company. They are a bit thinner than the ones that we did get from the movers, but being new, there aren't any holes, tears, worn areas and we are very pleased w/the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did what I needed them to do
customer_reviews.text: They did what I needed them to do. By no means are they “movers grade” but they were plenty durable for me. I purchased a second set of them. Very happy with how they worked out. They protected my furniture from rubbing during a 700 mile move in a U-Haul trailer.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: They just work
customer_reviews.text: These moving blankets were perfect for padding furniture and other items for our move across the country. They didn't smell at all, were very well packed, don't fall apart and were heavy enough to do the job. They are not "professional" quality but very good for general moving.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Great Moving Blanket
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! Perfect price for a moving blanket that provides both great coverage and protection for all necessary items. I used them for covering the bed of my Tundra while moving big and small items from an apartment move. Worked like a charm and would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: NFCfromNYC

customer_reviews.title: Surprised at quailty.
customer_reviews.text: I just bought these to protect some furniture while our home is remodeled. I'm not going into the moving business. I was surprised at how nice there were for a task so mundane and basic. They are large and will work nice. I bought them along with these really humongous rubber bands to hold the blankets on.
customer_reviews.author: Woodshop Man

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the money
customer_reviews.text: The blankets come in a super tight bundle and they are so compacted that basically they are smashed and flat when you open over time they fluff up but not much, these are cheap and you might need to double them up when you wrap up your nice items...
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Weird smell
customer_reviews.text: The blankets were a good price, which is why we bought them. They have a weird smell even after being open for several weeks. Would not recommend for that fact alone. Also, they weren’t very sturdy. Next time I would buy a heavier weight.
customer_reviews.author: Elise

customer_reviews.title: good size, good thickness
customer_reviews.text: I needed a covering for outdoor animal cages. This did the trick. Not too heavy individually so I could handle the blankets easily. Able to tie them down and cover with tarps to hold in heat. They did very well during the very cold weather over the holidays.
customer_reviews.author: pema drolma

customer_reviews.title: Great Value! Far above Expectations For The Price :)
customer_reviews.text: I am amazed at the quality of the Sure Max blankets. I live on a strict budget and wondered about the quality after my order. They were packed well and far exceed my expectations. I hope to save my pennies so I can purchase one more order of 12 . I use them to help insulate the windows and doors in my 100 plus yr. old house. I would highly recommend these durable blankets.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Kraft

customer_reviews.title: Good quality moving blankets
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical when I ordered these wondering if they would be cheap and thin - not at all. Used these for a cross country move to cover all of my dining room furniture (wood) - table, chairs, hutch, wine rack. A really great deal and still like new after the cross-country move. At the time I bought these, they were the best deal I could find in store or online. Very pleased and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: SunshineNMotion

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are heavy blankets that worked perfectly for our move. We used them to protect some of our heavier wood furniture. The quality for the price is definitely worth it. They still look new after first use.
customer_reviews.author: Dan & Nancy Hieronymus

customer_reviews.title: Not at all "heavy weight", but they seem ok ...
customer_reviews.text: Not at all "heavy weight", but they seem ok for our purpose (wrapping around dog beds). they took quite a while to arrive and smelled chemically when they arrived, but it seems to have dissipated.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mildew!
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I opened the packaging, the overpowering stench of mildew wafted through my house. Every one of the dozen blankets stank. I unfolded them all and let them air out in my garage for 3 weeks, and all that did was make my garage smell like mildew. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: CN Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for a cross country move
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the money. Buying them in the store would cost almost 3x as much. Not super thick but they protected all my item in a cross country shipment. Furniture, tv, even my road bike, all wrapped up and no problems. The movers that loaded my stuff said these were exactly like the ones they use when people purchase blankets directly from them.
customer_reviews.author: Tim P.

customer_reviews.title: Really helpful with packing
customer_reviews.text: We're preparing to move across the country (Maryland-->Washington State), and these blankets helped a ton during packing. They seem sturdy, and hopefully they'll protect our belongings while they're in storage for 6 months, then during transit.
customer_reviews.author: LindsayE

customer_reviews.title: They just look like moving blankets
customer_reviews.text: Super thin. Typical cheap garbage and product deception one is likely to find when dealing with overseas manufacturer's.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Lunker

customer_reviews.title: Great pads to protect your valuables
customer_reviews.text: These are really great for the money. We moved most of our belongings from Ohio to Florida and nothing was damaged because of these padded blankets! We're taking another load down and will use them again. They still look like new!!
customer_reviews.author: Junglejoyce

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Moving Blankets
customer_reviews.text: These are strong and fully cover small and medium sized pieces of furniture, but they also weigh a lot; if you have to move or carry them, make packets of 3 or 4 with packing tape or string. (I live in New York City, where things like that can be an issue somehow!)
customer_reviews.author: Sophia van der Kleij

customer_reviews.title: Price point great, pad is good
customer_reviews.text: These are great for moving, I own a small moving company and unless u are building 12-14ft drop frame semi tiers of furniture these are fine for the uhaul and bobtail work. My wife thought they had a slight smell but not really because no one else though soo
customer_reviews.author: mrmkelly

customer_reviews.title: we used these to move over 800 miles
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for our whole house furniture when we moved. They worked well. I would not consider getting any other thickness though. These were just thick enough. Make sure you purchase twine or other product to secure around your furniture, other wise it will be on the floor of your moving vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: We used this product to help protect our furniture during a long distance move. Very compact shipping for the number of blankets ordered.
customer_reviews.author: SawDust

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: Well made and just right for moving yourself. Not very thick but I knew that from the description. If you want thick then order a heaver weight. These will last for years and be useful around the house for many tasks.
customer_reviews.author: OldHermit

customer_reviews.title: Not of enduring quality
customer_reviews.text: These packing blankets are not of quality material. The picture is very misleading. Think of packing blankets made of the same material as disposable surgical gowns and thats what you have.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to wrap furniture during move and storage....a little thinner then expected but did the job well and priced right.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product for wrapping and storage
customer_reviews.text: Good product for wrapping and storage. Maybe good for once or twice use. At lease they do not fall apart like the cheap ones on the first time use. recommend the product. Just make sure the delivery - drops off the box at your house and not the curb side.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quantity is less in package.
customer_reviews.text: Sure-Max 12 Moving & Packing Blankets - Deluxe Pro - 80" x 72" (40 lb/dz Weight) - Professional Quilted Shipping Furniture Pads Royal Blue We bought this product for future moving purpose in the month of June. We have recently opened the bag and found only 11 pieces instead of 12 pieces. The product is very good, and we have used them. Is that possible to send the missing 1 piece.
customer_reviews.author: sruthi mantri

customer_reviews.title: Good product but hard to open
customer_reviews.text: The moving blankets will meet my needs for a cross country move. My only dislike is that they were wrapped so tightly with multiple poly type of ribbons that they dug deeply into the blankets and couldn't be cut. I had to use a knife to saw through or dig at them and actually ended up poking a hole in one of the blankets. But the blankets themselves seem sturdy and good for my move.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality.  Expected a fabric.
customer_reviews.text: I expected to receive this item as a real cloth blanket/pad. It's a cheap fabric that can tear very easily. To think I spent this much money and will not use them. Better off going to Wally-world and buying quilting fabric over this product.
customer_reviews.author: marie S

customer_reviews.title: MOVING AND MUCH MORE
customer_reviews.text: We ordered these blankets when we were moving from one state to another and they worked well. We have also had occasions to use them for many more things since moving.
customer_reviews.author: Dylsgram

customer_reviews.title: Good to go
customer_reviews.text: These 12 moving quilts met my expectations & also met the needs perfectly. I should have gotten another 12 blankets, that was my only regret. They come in a rolled up pack and the furniture loaders opened it and used them all. Very good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Great product and service.
customer_reviews.text: First grade product, delivered as committed. Liked it so much I re-ordered more.
customer_reviews.author: FireRock

customer_reviews.title: Great job
customer_reviews.text: Just right to cover my important objects like my water softener with deli canteen parts as I traveled from FL to Tx. I have washed and they are still good for the future
customer_reviews.author: Minara

customer_reviews.title: thinner and smaller in overall size than I expected. ...
customer_reviews.text: thinner and smaller in overall size than I expected...but it was user error- should have read the description. I just needed some in a hurry- they did the job - if not 2 together.
customer_reviews.author: KHB255

customer_reviews.title: A bit disappointed
customer_reviews.text: While these moving blankets are OK, they don't live up to expectations as "Professional" quality. Don't think I'd order them again.
customer_reviews.author: Lou Kief

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made
customer_reviews.text: Top quality pads did a great job during our move, provided excellent protection. Much nicer than the ones available from the truck rental company
customer_reviews.author: Roy Smith

customer_reviews.title: Excellent moving blankets
customer_reviews.text: Very good for everything we needed. Just enough padding for everything, but not too thick to take up valuable moving space.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: These moving and packing blankets worked great. Same as our professional movers used!
customer_reviews.author: RSC

customer_reviews.title: Great quality moving blankets!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my brother in law. He said they are really good quality and a better price than what he could get them for at any local store.
customer_reviews.author: heyall

customer_reviews.title: Good value pads
customer_reviews.text: Would like to see them be thicker. that said, I would purchase them again if I needed more.
customer_reviews.author: GHoward777

customer_reviews.title: These blankets held up fantastic. I spent a lot of time packing things ...
customer_reviews.text: I moved 2 households about 600 miles. These blankets held up fantastic. I spent a lot of time packing things well, but with the aid of these blankets, not a single item broke in my cross country move. They're thick and easy to work with. Best purchase I made to assist with my move.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L. Kindle

customer_reviews.title: Generally disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Arrived earlier then expected. Not as the picture shows. Yes they all weighted 40 lbs! Came in a huge bundle straight from China. The picture makes you think these are traditional moving blankets made of cotton and quilted. NOT that, very thin and some sort of netting fabric. Especially the edging is THIN. o.k. for laying on airplane wings but I am generally very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked out great
customer_reviews.text: These blankets worked really well. They are a good size for fitting over furniture and protected items. Definitely a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Great quality at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Came on time as promised and the quality was awesome. Used the product to wrap furniture for a move from California to Texas.
customer_reviews.author: Jim DelMonte

customer_reviews.title: Almost pro
customer_reviews.text: Not as heavy as real pro blankets but good value for the price
customer_reviews.author: Dave Fullmer

customer_reviews.title: High quality, quick shipping. Mix Wholesale is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for moving two antique desks and they were perfect for the job. No longer have to rent pads for small jobs. I was worried they would be musty, moldy, or mildewed coming from the east coast but they were too new. Just a slight odor from the manufacturing process (slight machine oil smell). Very quick shipping from Mix Wholesale, thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Great pads
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality at a good price. These will last a long time for moves and safe storage. Much much better padding than the non-woven type blankets you rent from the rental places.
customer_reviews.author: Cincinnati Wolf

customer_reviews.title: These are great moving blankets
customer_reviews.text: However, my moving company did not use them enough and I had scratches to my wood furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Reader

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty moving blankets. Used in storage will work fine. Moving pack tight
customer_reviews.text: They came tightly bundled on the day they posted The blankets were not the quantity I was expecting, durability will be tested. I would recommend doubling them up for nicer pieces of furniture the wild work just fine covering furniture in storage,moving
customer_reviews.author: Rick Lee Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Fine product — but STRONG MILDEW SMELL
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for a move, to use to wrap my belongings. They were fine and did their job for one move, with occasional rips and tears. My biggest issue is how terrible these blankets smell — like mildew. Even if I wanted to save them for other uses they smell way too bad to store in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A.

customer_reviews.title: On the move
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our new Amish made cabinets and furniture move.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl B

customer_reviews.title: box intact
customer_reviews.text: good product but did have odor.....I used for dog beds but otherwise they would require washing
customer_reviews.author: Sue Montgomery RNC

customer_reviews.title: great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I move kitchen cabinets for my business. These are working great
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: You get plenty for the money
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality. Worth the price. Definitely reusable. Did a great job for my move. You get plenty for the money.
customer_reviews.author: BrooklynStyles

customer_reviews.title: A little thin but works OK
customer_reviews.text: A little thin but works well...you pay for what you get
customer_reviews.author: Robert P.

customer_reviews.title: Moving blankets
customer_reviews.text: Cheap price and quality of it just okay. Works well for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: oloto

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a single moving blanket from Home Depot for $20 that looks/feels the same as these do. I used all 12 of these for a recent move and do not regret the purchase one bit.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon L Harper

customer_reviews.title: Nice blankets
customer_reviews.text: Really cant beat the price @ +/- 5 bucks a blanket
customer_reviews.author: Kenster lt1

customer_reviews.title: Solid and large.
customer_reviews.text: Great blankets for moving and wrapping furniture. They are large, solid and very reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Danny D

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect weight & protected our furniture well. Highly recommend them. They arrived on time as well.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Excellent moving blankets
customer_reviews.text: Used these for a longer haul move. Totally protected our furniture. Will hold up for future moves as the quality is very good. Perfect thickness. Well worth the money spent and would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer W.

customer_reviews.title: Great pads for your move!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality for the money. They didn’t have a horrible odor like the first cheaper pads I had ordered from someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Baird

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These are outstanding and quality. Saved my furniture for sure! I pass them around to friends when needed and they have been used over and over again! Great product
customer_reviews.author: Downton's Abby gal

customer_reviews.title: These are good blankets - not the super thick ones - but ...
customer_reviews.text: These are good blankets - not the super thick ones - but adequate for most uses. Haven't had them long enough to know how they hold up - but they look like all the rest. We generally loose them before they get worn out...
customer_reviews.author: djones

customer_reviews.title: great price, a little thin
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to help protect our wood floors during a remodeling project. Great price compared to local stores. However they were thinner than expected. We should have enough of them to just fold them in half before laying them down on the floors to give us sufficient protection.
customer_reviews.author: myrallea

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Our furniture was protected and we had no scratches on anything! Very happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: JAE

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: A little small and thin but, tjey got all of my household goods moved 2000 miles without damage.
customer_reviews.author: Life's Good

customer_reviews.title: Time will tell with moving
customer_reviews.text: Have my furniture wrapped in them now, hope they keep furniture damage free
customer_reviews.author: Froggy

customer_reviews.title: One year later, and they are falling apart
customer_reviews.text: Falling apart after one year of light use. I put them on top of patio furniture while I deliver or lay them down in on a truck bed to put cushions on them . they work, they just disintegrate in a year.. same as harbor freight
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Langan

customer_reviews.title: Great Moving Blankets
customer_reviews.text: I don't leave many reviews here but after a lifetime of many moves these blankets are heavy just like the ones you typically rent from truck companies. Experienced movers know that blankets are needed well before and after you rent a truck these are well worth the price and will last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: These were much better than I though they would be! Perfect for moving and excellent value for a he money.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Smith

customer_reviews.title: Shipping pads
customer_reviews.text: Because the original order was short by one blanket, as instructed, I removed a single blanket from the second shipment and returned the rest. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Robert L. Wiggins

customer_reviews.title: I’m glad I bought them
customer_reviews.text: I bought them to cover some furniture in the basement. Blankets are big and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: susan n

customer_reviews.title: A Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Great blanket at a good price. Moved a whole house full of furniture and used the blankets to protect many pieces. Worked wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: OC girl

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Great buy for the money. Cheaper than Harbor freight per blanket
customer_reviews.author: Matthew M.

product_meta.title: Sure-Max 12 Moving & Packing Blankets - Deluxe Pro - 80" x 72" (40 lb/dz weight) - Professional Quilted Shipping Furniture Pads Royal Blue
product_meta.description:
Sure-Max deluxe moving blankets offer the ideal combination of quality, durability, and cost-effectiveness to protect furniture, appliances, and other valuable items from scuffing, scratching, or breaking during transport or while in storage.

These substantial-weight blankets are constructed of premium-grade materials, including ultra-plush, padded cotton batting with a resilient fabric cover. Zig-zag stitching and polyester binding offer extra reinforcement and strength. Blankets are not machine washable, spot clean only. Do not tumble dry.

Whether you are an individual doing a home move or a professional mover or cargo hauler, these shipping blankets are perfectly suited for any shipping need, regardless of distance. Take the stress out of moving with peace of mind that fragile items will arrive safely and intact with Sure-Max moving blankets.

Sure-Max is a trusted supplier within the moving and transport industry, offering a wide selection of premium-quality moving blankets and supplies.
feature_bullets: PROFESSIONAL-GRADE: Oversized, 80" x 72" premium quality moving pads that provide exceptional damage protection from scratches, nicks, dirt, and moisture when moving or transporting furniture, appliances, and other valuable large items.

SUPERIOR CUSHIONING: Constructed with thick, padded virgin cotton batting with polyester binding, these packing blankets offer superior protection compared to most competitor's blankets made from inferior materials. Zig-zag stitching holds inner cushioning in place for consistent padding protection and prolonged pad life.

DURABLE: Weighing approximately 3-1/2 pounds apiece, these heavy-duty furniture blankets feature a reinforced double-lock stitched fabric with polyester binding that is highly resilient to tears and built-to-last.

MULTI-PURPOSE: Ideal for both professional and do-it-yourself moving, these versatile, general purpose blankets are well suited for safe, breathable protection for items in storage, as well as protecting floors, car upholstery, and much more.
DUAL-SIDED: Quality, double-sided construction allows for added convenience and protection when securely wrapping up items or sliding furniture across floors.
